column5: Sent the monthly allowance. Use it wisely.
Received. Thanks Dad.
How is the project coming along? Dr. Sharma mentioned you were busy.
It's going well. A bit complex but I'm managing.
Did you check the car insurance papers I sent?
Not yet. I'll check after my lab.
Your mother is planning a puja next month. Make sure you are free.
Okay Dad. Just let me know the dates.
Your mother says you aren't picking up her calls. Call her.
I was just in a meeting. Calling her now.
Check the news. Tech layoffs are starting. Focus on your grades.
Yes Dad. I am spending extra time in the lab now.
Have you applied for the Summer Internship at TechCorp?
Working on the resume today. Deadline is next week.
We are planning the Manali trip for June. Check your exam dates.
Last exam is May 28th. June is clear for me.
Don't spend too much on that concert tonight. Save for the trip.
It was a cheap ticket Dad. Don't worry.
Did you call the bank regarding the education loan interest?
I'll do it today. Got busy with the college fest.
Dr. Sharma says you missed the morning meeting. Is everything okay?
Just a slight headache. Overslept. I'm fine now.
